00009 #include <oryx_diagnostics/DiagnosticsCommand.h>

00012 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00013         ros::init(argc, argv, "oryx_diagnostics_client");
00014         ros::NodeHandle nh;
00015         ros::NodeHandle pnh("~");
00016 
00017         ros::ServiceClient client = nh.serviceClient<oryx_diagnostics::DiagnosticsCommand>("oryx/diagnostics/commands");
00018 
00019         std::string command;
00020         std::string arguments;
00021 
00022         pnh.getParam("command", command);
00023         pnh.getParam("arg", arguments);
00024 
00025         if(command == "") ROS_WARN("No Command Given!");
00026         else{
00027                 oryx_diagnostics::DiagnosticsCommand msg;
00028                 msg.request.command = command;
00029                 msg.request.data = arguments;
00030                 if(client.call(msg.request, msg.response)){
00031                         if(msg.response.success)
00032                         {
00033                                 ROS_INFO("%s", msg.response.data.c_str());
00034                         }
00035                         else
00036                         {
00037                                 ROS_WARN("Error With Command: %s", msg.response.data.c_str());
00038                         }
00039 
00040                 }
00041                 else
00042                 {
00043                         ROS_ERROR("Could Not Communicate With Server!");
00044                 }
00045         }
00046 }
